attributes.action: Provide £500 cash grant to fund children being home schooled
attributes.additional_details: With the Government closing schools and home learning being the normal for many parents that are also working from home IT equipment is needed to access the e-learning material. Laptop's are not cheap!
attributes.background: Government to provide £500 cash grant per child to purchase equipment needed for home learning.
